translations: 语言以外的；语言学以外的

sentences.sentence: AndreLefevere is one of the western scholars who have been devoted to extralinguistic studies.
sentences.translation: 许多西方学者都致力于翻译中的语言外部研究，勒费弗尔就是其中之一。

sentences.sentence: In recent years, people have made much study on the paralinguistic and extralinguistic features in oral communication.
sentences.translation: 近年来人们对口语交际中的副语言和超语言特征进行了大量的研究。

sentences.sentence: Translation has traditionally been regarded as a matter of linguistic transfer, dismissing extralinguistic factors out of its field.
sentences.translation: 传统的翻译学把翻译仅仅看作是从一种文字到另一种文字的纯语言转换，而没有考虑到文本之外的因素。
